we do
Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) provides a software update service for Microsoft Windows operating systems and other Microsoft software. WSUS is a locally managed system that works with the public Microsoft Update website to give system administrators more control.
By using Windows Server Update Services, administrators can manage the distribution of Microsoft hotfixes and updates released through Automatic Updates to computers in a corporate environment.

Windows 7 and Windows Server 2k8 have the same Kernel architecture

that's what a beta is for - so big developers like those for Antivirus Software or hardware driver developers can fit their software for the future service pack
how do you think game devs can make games for consoles that aren't released? the same way as this, they release betas with the same functionality
and that's why you should use WSUS instead. If a computer's registered in the domain, you can monitor and administrate it through the console, knowing exactly which computer has which patch and is allowed which patch

06Word -04 spooky
0406Definition -04 There is a big difference between the words "spooky" and "creepy." Spooky can't hurt you. Creepy can and probably will. Goth is not "Creepy." It's "Spooky." rubber bats are not "creepy." They're "spooky."
0406Example -04 skull jewelry=spooky coming across a human skull in your backyard=creepy. (well, maybe not, depending on who put it there/your tastes)

7=3
!rules
Rules for #wiihelp:
1. NO PIRACY (or back-ups, don't go pretending, they are the same thing)! We're happy to help with getting the latest emulator to work but you'll be kicked (or banned) if you ask where to get ROMs etc. How to install VC / WiiWare games or asking where to get them will get you an instant ban as will asking for .ISOs or asking on support for modchips or any other piracy or backup-related topics.
(For the purposes of this channel, the term "softmod" shall be defined as "any software installable to the wii that will allow you to play illegally obtained wii games". Softmodding in and of itself is illegal, and therefore it and anything pertaining to it falls under the category of piracy. Softmodding does NOT mean "installing homebrew channel", "homebrewing your wii", or anything of that nature.)
You Have Been Spammed! http://www.qwertymash.com
You Have Been Spammed! http://www.qwertymash.com
You Have Been Spammed! http://www.qwertymash.com
(Further, a "hardmod" is the same as a softmod, except that it is a hardware chip physically installed into your wii. Together, these are referred to as "mods" and are therefore illegal and fall under the piracy rule.)
You Have Been Spammed! http://www.qwertymash.com
You Have Been Spammed! http://www.qwertymash.com
You Have Been Spammed! http://www.qwertymash.com
2. There is no need to ask 'Can I ask a question' - just jump straight in with it
3. No offtopic talk. This is particularly annoying for those trying to ask legitiate questions. There are other channels for off topic wii chat (try #wiidevot). Ops have the final word on what is and what isn't offtopic and offenders will be kicked and then banned
4. We have all the ops that we need - do not ask to be an op. If you are a regula helper you may be promoted to have voice and should we need more ops we will promote from there
5. No IRC scripts / bots without permission (but as long as the bot is not annoying or obtrusive, we will likely not decline). This includes autorejoin and away messages (apart from non-intrusive ones - ones that do not count as a real message, for example changing nicks or using /away)
6. Flooding / autojointhere are bots in place to stop this. Persistent offenders will be banned
7. No flaming (insulting / abusing other users)
8. For more detailed dev help try #wiidev and for low level info try #hackmii. #wiidevot should be used for offtopic. Do not post links to other channels apart from these (though if it is not piracy-related and will genuinely help, it tends to be allowed).
9. Our bots are here to help. Abuse of commands such as !seen and the searches will get you kicked.
10. Don't talk in CAPITAL letters, people will find this anoying and will only ignore you
11. Don't advertise websites or channels unless they contain useful information relating to the problem at hand. Always use Wiibrew if possible.

Trumps is where all the cards are dealt out between the players, ace is high, one player chooses the trump suit, which wins over other suits. Goal is to win as many hands as possible, you must play the same suit as the first card played in a hand, if you can, if not you can play whatever you want, if you play a the highest trump card in the hand, you win.

0406Definition -04 Also known as DOTD, donut of the day is a competition held on school trips, although predominatly skiing trips. Although mainly used for stupidity, be it verbal or physical, great stacks can also result in being nominated DOTD. The person nominated DOTD wears a high visibility

14I detect fa- I mean botsex
wit COPY --psel NO-UPDATE -zPvBr $1 -o /media/2.0tb/WiiIso/wbfs/
for i in `wit LS| grep -v '\-\-\-' | grep -v "ID6"|grep -v "Total:"|grep -v ^$|sed "s/[ :']/_/g"|sed 's/\&/and/g' `; do mkdir "/media/2.0tb/WiiIso/wbfs/$i"; mv /media/2.0tb/WiiIso/wbfs/`echo "$i.wbfs"|cut -b1-6`.wbf* /media/2.0tb/WiiIso/wbfs/$i; wit V -v /media/2.0tb/WiiIso/wbfs/$i/`echo "$i.wbfs"|cut -b1-6`.wbfs ; done
